channel.title: [PI] NPC Drops Help [PI]
channel.description:
#general graardor 6260:25 829:1 391:2 385:2 564:50 1249:1 3052:3 892:75 1303:1 808:100 1602:3 1917:1 1971:1 1514:16 1319:1 1275:1 3024:3 1606:3 454:150 560:100 563:50 561:75 1373:1 1127:1 5300:2 2440:3 1604:3 1452:1 995:100000 1149:1 830:5 1079:1 886:100 1608:3 11712:1 11728:1 11714:1 11724:1 11704:1 11710:1
Can Someone Explain to me, where the percentage is, how often does he drop it, what item he drops. Im getting frutrated over this. And also, whenever i kill him, nothing ever drops :O? Im using PI + iHybrid And also, do i have to add it to NPC.cfg? Im completely mixed up with this... Is there any tutorial out there?
